channel.title: Help with range

item.title: Help with range
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214) // crystal bow
{
 PkingDelay = 20;
 wepdelay = 20;
 UseBow = true;
 	
 createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 80, 249, 43, 31, 0 - AttackingOn);
}

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15186) // dark bow
{
PkingDelay = 5;
wepdelay = 20;
UseBow = true;
createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 80, 249, 43, 31, 0 - AttackingOn);
createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 80, 249, 43, 31, 0 - AttackingOn);
}

Are my things to make the projectiles, for the crystal bow, it makes 1 arrow, then like 6 following it, how do i fix this?

And how do i make these work on npcs?

Read full topic
